summary: This configuration file defines Azure-based OpenAI model settings. It includes variables for API key, base URL, supported models, and default embedding/completion models. The is_azure flag confirms the Azure context, while api_version specifies the required version.

details.comment: This configuration file defines Azure-based OpenAI model settings. It includes variables for API key, base URL, supported models, and default embedding/completion models. The is_azure flag confirms the Azure context, while api_version specifies the required version.
